column4: Cool, 54 packages will be removed, 254 installed and 1046 upgraded :P
All I need right now is irc and nano, so I can write some exam notes :P
well, with the "all I need" comment, you made it seem like you were pressed for time, etc.
I am, so this'll make me not use PC that much ;)
sorry, got mixed up with update-alternatives, just `dpkg-reconfigure gdm`
